title: Test Lead
tagsAndSkills: Training,SIDE,Manager Quality Assurance,CMS,Test scenarios,Mentor,Test Lead,Test cases
jobDescription:
QualityKiosk looking forTest Lead to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey" A Test Lead is responsible for managing the testing activities of a software development project.
  • Developing and implementing a test plan for the project, including defining test objectives, test cases, and test scenarios.
  • Conducting test reviews and collaborating with the development team to identify and resolve defects and issues.
  • Developing and maintaining test documentation, including test plans, test cases, test scripts, and test reports.
  • Managing the testing environment, including setting up test environments, managing test data, and ensuring that testing resources are available.
  • Managing the testing budget, including estimating testing costs, tracking expenses, and managing resources to stay within budget.

title: Project Manager - Business Intelligence
tagsAndSkills: Business Intelligence,Power BI,Ms Power Bi,MSBI,Business Intelligence Reporting,Microsoft Power Bi,Bi Tools,Microsoft BI
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

This role will be responsible for delivering various BI projects as requested by the internal business teams on a regular basis.

  • Oversee and take responsibility for the successful delivery of a range of projects which should result in accurate analysis and faster decision making while maintaining data security.
  • Upgrade and transform the reporting and visualization platform (currently on Power BI) to be world-class.
  • Becoming a thought partner for front-end teams across the SBIFM landscape as an SME on reporting and visualization.
  • Ensure front-end visualizations are captivating and would call for action, enabling leaders to make the right decisions at a fast pace.
  • Managing the MSBI development team of 10-15 people
  • Make the backend architecture agile and use efficient data warehousing and ETL techniques to optimize cost.
  • Data maintenance through governance on storage, ETL and quality.
  • Optimization of the performance of reports.
  • Coordination with support teams like DBA, Microsoft & other internal support teams.
  • Work very closely with Sales, Investment, Risk, Operations, Finance, Compliance and HR teams to understand business requirements, and help build the appropriate reports and dashboards to meet those requirements.
  • Present to senior leaders of the company as you build a state-of-the-art visualization platform for Reporting and Analytics.
  • Set up end to end real-time interactive dashboard for the company, with a great understanding of the business requirements and domain knowledge, with the expectation that we push the boundaries way beyond whats being done today.
  • Collaborate with multiple teams to drive business outcomes with speed.


Preferred candidate profile

  • Bachelors/Master's Degree in Computer Science or Engineering
  • 10-12 years of Relevant experience implementing BI projects primarily on MSBI & Power BI/data visualization.
  • In-depth knowledge and experience in MSBI components and managing databases.
  • Should have good knowledge and experience in data warehousing and designing IT architecture.
  • Very good knowledge on ETL

  • Good knowledge on cloud and working knowledge on atleast on cloud service provider like Azure, AWS or GCP.
  • Expert on SQL,
  • Relevant Project management experience.
  • Minimum 3 years of Team management experience.
  • Strong communication (written, verbal, and presentation) skills.
  • Strong business acumen, curiosity, agility, analytical and problem-solving skills to translate user requirements into appropriate dashboards, visualizations, and reports.

Perks and benefits

Salary + Benefits
